div.p:
Here, I work on various personal projects, learn and grow as much as I can,
experiment with frameworks and technologies, and safely archive past works.

div.ul: Frontend: TypeScript/JavaScript, React, Redux, Recoil.js Tailwind, SCSS/CSS, MUI/JoyUI/Material UI, Vite/CRA, Webpack, Rollup Angular JS (1.x), Angular (13.x), Babel, Gulp, Apollo, Breeze, Axios Polymer.js, Highcharts, Node.js, Flask
Backend: C# .NET, Microsoft SQL Server, Entity Framework PostgreSQL, SQLAlchemy, Alembic, MySQL, NoSQL/Redis, YAML
Tools: Visual Studio Code, Visual Studio, SQL Server Management Studio, dbForge Studio, Postman, PyCharm Cloud Foundry, Predix
路 Learning server-side rendering/components and static-site regeneration
路 Finding an updated and modern replacement for Recoil.js that is less convulated and clunky than Redux
路 Continuing to evolve on best practices for both performance optimization and accessibility in websites (avoid network waterfalls too!)
路 Improving my personal structural organization and note-keeping
路 Seeking out a framework or library that excites me
路 Creating abstract art, graphic designs, and logos
